thread.title: You can shop Too Faced’s new Love Light prismatic highlighters, like right NOW
thread.title_full: You can shop Too Faced’s new Love Light prismatic highlighters, like right NOW

author: Lourdes Avila Uribe
title: You can shop Too Faced’s new Love Light prismatic highlighters, like right NOW

organizations.name: ray of light too faced cosmetics

text:
You can shop Too Faced’s new Love Light prismatic highlighters, like right NOW Stop whatever it is you’re doing because we have some very important and time sensitive mood about one of Too Faced’s most highly anticipated highlighters, Love Light . These gorgeous prismatic highlighters are finally available as we speak , and we have a feeling they’re going to fly off the shelves! What are you waiting for? Go!
This is an unexpected early release, and we’re having joyous heart palpitations over this news . A little while back, Jerrod Blandino let us in on the secret that this product was inspired by the glow that women get when they’re in love, and who doesn’t want to look that radiant all the time?
Love Light Prismatic Highlighters will light you up all day and night. Available March 9th on toofaced.com! #toofaced 
A post shared by Too Faced Cosmetics (@toofaced) on Mar 6, 2017 at 11:41am PST 
Head on over to Sephora and get your own Love Light Highlighter in one of three gorgeous shades for $30. Pearl radiance and silky smooth texture. Available March 9th on toofaced.com! #toofaced 
A post shared by Too Faced Cosmetics (@toofaced) on Mar 1, 2017 at 4:11pm PST 
Let’s take a look at these beautiful choices!
Ray Of Light Too Faced Cosmetics A rose gold.
Blinded By The Light Too Faced Cosmetics A champagne.
You Light Up My Life[/subheader] Too Faced Cosmetics A gold.
Do you have a fave or do you think you’ll pick all three?
The thing that makes these prismatic highlighters so special is their exclusive liquid-to-powder formula, meaning that it takes the best parts of powder, liquid, baked, and cream formulas to create an insanely pearlescent, silky smooth, highly pigmented finish.
Unlike traditional pressed highlighters that crush the pearls, our innovative technology keeps the pearls spherical so they will reflect light from any angle ✨ Available March 9th at @sephora and toofaced.com #trendingatsephora #toofaced 
A post shared by Too Faced Cosmetics (@toofaced) on Mar 4, 2017 at 6:11am PST 
Most traditional pressed powders crush the pearls during the pressing process, but Jerrod created brand new technology that keeps the pearls spherical so they’re able to reflect light from any angle. Isn’t that amazing? We love the science that goes into creating all these beautiful products that make us feel ultra-glam!
Run your fingers over to Sephora ASAP and pick up one (or two, or three!) of these beauties for yourself. Spring is just around the corner, and we’ll be needing all that beautiful highlight we can get!
